about_the_game:
Venture forth, battle monsters, and find loot.
Build your party of characters.
Bruteforce, cunning, or adeptly wielding magic?
Adapt, or be decisive?
The choice is yours.

Features

  • An itemisation system with items of different types and rarities.
    Each item has a set of random affixes.
    Some affixes are simple bonuses to character stats.
    Others grant combat abilities and effects.
    Some of these abilities scale with different character or equipment stats.
  • 6 different classes to build your party with.
    Each class bring a set of talents.
    Classes are a starting point.
    The talent system allow characters to be shaped in different ways.
  • A crafting system with runes.
    Runes are consumable items that alter the properties of items.
    There are 5 different kinds, each with its own usage area.
  • Turn based combat.
    Combat takes place on a game board where units take turns attacking.
    Stats, effects, and abilities of units shape the battle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
